The correct sequence of actions to deploy a Power Pages site by using a template is as follows:

Choose a template: You can choose a starter layout template, a solution template, or a Dynamics 365 template to build your site, or you can choose a blank page template to create a completely custom site.
Enter a name and web address: You can enter a name for your site and a web address that will be used to access it. The web address must be unique within your environment.
Select a Microsoft Dataverse environment: You can select an existing environment or create a new one to store the data and metadata for your site. The environment must have a Dataverse database.
Publish the site: You can publish the site to make it available on the web. You can also preview the site before publishing it to see how it looks and works.
